attributes.action: put forward Eddie Izzard to receive a Knighthood for his astonishing acheivements in raising money for Sports Relief through running 43 marathons in 51 days
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Eddie Izzard took on the unbelievable challenge to run 43 marathons in 51 days to promote and raise money for Sports Relief in order to help poor, ill and disadvantaged children in the UK and around the world.
Although suffering from many ailments during this challenge he continued on his gruelling schedule in order to complete the task he had set himself.
He is an inspiration to all of us, and deserves recognition for such an outstanding example of charity.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
